item.description:
We've been on a bit of a hiatus from hosting events, but now that we're done with moving, we're excited to get back into game playing. (Note our address has changed.)

Should you have a favorite game please bring it; otherwise, you know we're well stocked. You are also welcome to bring a favorite snack for the evening. We'll have plenty to drink.

For those who have never attended a traditional game night, we usually split up in different rooms to play smaller games of players' choice and then come together for a larger game or two at the end of the night.

* You should know that we are a household with cats, but they will be locked up for the evening. The house is also home to a well-behaved one year old, who will obviously not be locked up for the evening.

* Parking is available on Upham Street, but it is a little tight. There is generally more parking available toward Orne St., and more parking is available on Orne and Dearborn Streets. In the event of a snow emergency, this event will be canceled Should the weather turn, please have our number with you.

*Members who have been a "no-show" in the last three months will not be permitted to RSVP for this event.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Traditional Game Night
